roleset.name: indulge, treat (excessively?) nicely

example.name: transitive
example.text: He pampers them; he invites them to fabulous parties; he strokes them.

roleset.note: PAMPER-V NOTES: Frames file for 'pamper' based on sentences in financial subcorpus. No Verbnet entry. No comparison. (from pamper.01-v predicate notes)
